pr_title: DHFPROD-4095: Provide role information and better error output on login to UI

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4095: Provide role information on login to UI

timeline.bodyText: This seems brittle - an "instanceof" check like below would be a lot better - more reliable and self-documenting. Can the custom code that creates this message throw a better exception for this class to catch?
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText:
marklogic-data-hub/one-ui/src/main/java/com/marklogic/hub/oneui/auth/LoginLogoutHandler.java
    
    
         Line 49
      in
      f1305eb
    
    
    
    

        
          
           RolesService rolesService = RolesService.on(authenticationToken.getHubConfigSession().newStagingClient()); 
        
    
  


Since we autowired the hubConfigSession, we do not need to access it through authentication token.
timeline.author: hao1st

replies.bodyText: I should remove the autowired hubConfig. I was getting a null hubConfig when I tried to use the autowired version.
